shop.title: WinnerDream Shop
terms.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.intro: By using WinnerDream services, you agree to the following terms. These terms govern the use of our products, subscriptions, and features.
terms.section1.title: 1. Subscriptions
terms.section1.content: The monthly subscription renews automatically. You can cancel it anytime through your dashboard.
terms.section2.title: 2. Payment
terms.section2.content: All payments are securely processed via Stripe. No banking data is stored on our servers.
terms.section3.title: 3. Ownership
terms.section3.content: You retain ownership of your data. If you subscribe to a website plan, you can request a transfer at any time.
terms.section4.title: 4. Support
terms.section4.content: Our team is available to assist you with technical and business matters via your client space.
terms.section5.title: 5. Termination
terms.section5.content: You can end your subscription at any time. No refunds are issued for already started periods.
digital.header.title: Social Media Management & Paid Advertising
digital.header.subtitle: Grow your brand visibility and attract real customers online
digital.why.title: Why choose Winners Dream?
digital.why.content: We help you create a strong and consistent online presence that speaks directly to your target audience. From engaging content to smart ad strategies, we do it all for you.
digital.social.title: Our Social Media Services:
digital.social.items: 📱 Profile setup and branding (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc.)
digital.ads.title: Our Advertising Services:
digital.for.title: Who is this for?
digital.for.content: Entrepreneurs, small businesses, service providers, influencers — anyone who wants to grow online without spending hours figuring it out themselves.
digital.footer: © 2025 Winners Dream Business Growth LLC — All rights reserved.
email.appointment.subject: Your Appointment Confirmation
email.appointment.body: You have successfully booked an appointment on {{date}} at {{time}}. Thank you for choosing WinnerDream.
llc.title: Company Formation (LLC)
llc.description: Start your Limited Liability Company (LLC) in the United States easily with WinnerDream. We support you through every step of the process.
llc.features: ✅ LLC formation in the state of your choice (Delaware, Wyoming, etc.)
📄 Drafting and delivery of Articles of Organization
🧾 EIN (Employer Identification Number) application with the IRS
👨‍⚖️ Assistance opening a bank account (Mercury, Wise, etc.)
💼 Advice on tax and accounting obligations
📞 French-speaking customer support via email or WhatsApp
llc.benefits.title: Benefits of our LLC service:
llc.benefits.items: ✅ Access to business tools (Stripe, PayPal, Wise, Mercury, QuickBooks)
✅ Lifetime customer support via WhatsApp and Zoom
llc.receive.title: What you will receive:
llc.receive.items: 🏦 Help opening your U.S. business bank account
llc.states.title: States Available:
llc.states.text: You can choose to register your LLC in Wyoming, Delaware, Texas, or Florida – depending on your business strategy and tax preferences. We can help you choose the best one.
llc.footer: © 2025 Winners Dream Business Growth LLC — All rights reserved.

ads.title: Online Advertising
ads.description: Increase your business visibility through targeted advertising campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, and Google Ads. We optimize your budget for the best results.
ads.features: Creation and management of Facebook & Instagram campaigns
Design of attractive visuals and engaging copy
app.title: Mobile App Development
app.description: We design custom mobile applications for Android and iOS, tailored to your business goals and your users' expectations.
app.features: Advanced features: geolocation, push notifications, payments, etc.
Publishing on App Store and Google Play
app.price: depending on the complexity of the application
digital.title: Digitalization
digital.description: Go digital with our complete solutions to modernize your business. We support you with digital management, online presence, and process automation.
digital.features: Creation of management tools (inventory, invoicing, etc.)
Digitization of physical documents into digital tools
Implementation of custom CRM and ERP systems
digital.price: Custom quote — depending on specific needs
logo.title: Logo Design
logo.description: We design professional logos that reflect your brand identity.
website.title: Website Creation
website.description: We design modern, fast, and custom websites tailored to your goals—whether they are informational, commercial, or community-oriented.
website.features: Showcase site, e-commerce, or custom solution
Custom pages: home, services, contact, etc.
Integration of tools: newsletter, blog, form
website.benefits: Attract more customers with a professional site
Build a credible and modern brand image
Your site evolves with your business
website.price: Starting at $250 — depending on the type of site and features. Custom quotes available.
website.subscription.description: You can also choose an affordable monthly subscription, including website creation, hosting, maintenance, and updates.
